TopicTitle: Bizarre problem when rendezvousing with craft

Articles.Content:
Having a weird problem when I am returning to my orbiter with my lander. Whenever my orbiter comes into view, it looks like it has a chain of duplicates along the orbit of the craft. I can't take a screenshot because the game then slows to a crawl and then crashes. When I select the ship itself from the space center it is uncontrollable despite having a probe core. It's acting like the last stage of the craft (the landing capsule and parachute without anything else) has fired. I have never ever seen this before 0.25.

Edit: Finally got a screenshot.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/t9trfrmu8k2lx2c/screenshot0.png?dl=0

Edited October 10, 2014 by captainradish
Ok, figured this out on my own. Apparently some kind of problem with Realchute. Replacing my installed version with the new one fixed the issue.
